724751f-a.title: Manhattan: White Street - Centre Street
724751f-a.text:
(1)
118-122 white Street, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of
Centre Street.
June 22, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)  The same, as viewed from the clearance for the new Criminal
Courts Building to be erected on the opposite side.
June 12, 1938.
P. L  . Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
724751f-a.folder: White Street & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY

718566f-b.title: Manhattan: Centre Street - White Street
718566f-b.text:
Centre Street, south from White Street to Foley Square, showing
numerous city, state and federal structures. They are from left to
right, the low New York State Pldm., the Federal Courts Bldg., the
Municipal Bldg., the Tombs and the Criminal Couurts Bldg. The two
last mentioned only appear partially and are opposite a cleared are
on the east aide of Centre Street where their successors will rise.
View No. 2 is from Franklin Street, one block to the South and
shows mainly the Leonard Street side of the New York State Bldg.
June 10, 1938.
Vievs 1 and 2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
718566f-b.folder: Centre Street & White Street, Manhattan, NY

718566f-a.title: Manhattan: Centre Street - White Street

718566f-a.folder: Centre Street & White Street, Manhattan, NY

724750f-a.title: Manhattan: White Street - Centre Street (Northeast).
724750f-a.text:
Wite Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of
Centre Street, showing prominently three 2 1/2 story buildings
bearing No's. 118 to 122 inclusive. The photographer in No. 1
also shows a slight northward view on the east side of Centre
Street. To the right is the north Westeriy corner of the new
Criminal Courts site, same technically being the south east
corner of Centre and White Streets.
View No. 2 is northwestward from Franklin Street and shows
in addition a corner of the old Criminal Courts Bldg. and a city
rented office structure.
June 12, 1938.
Views 1 and 2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
724750f-a.folder: White Street & Centre Street (Northeast)., Manhattan, NY

718589f-a.title: Manhattan: Centre Street - White Street
718589f-a.folder: Centre Street & White Street, Manhattan, NY

718588f-a.title: Manhattan: Centre Street - White Street
718588f-a.text:
Centre Street, east side, north from White Street, showing an area
where second hand mechanical units are retailed.
November 2, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
718588f-a.folder: Centre Street & White Street, Manhattan, NY

724754f-a.title: Manhattan: White Street - Centre Street
724754f-a.text:
White Street, south side, east from Centre to Baxter Streets,
and showing under demolition buildings standing on what will be
the northly side of the new Crimina Couurta Bldg. and prison site.
These bear No's. 121 to 133 White Street; though the corner building
also bore No's. 122-130 Centre Street. At the left are tenements
on the east side of Bayard Street Ahich form a dead end for White
Street.
March 11, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
NO RRPRODUCTIONS.
724754f-a.folder: White Street & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY
